name: Zombie Room Clearer
description:
An online co-op top-down shooter. Play as one of two classes and battle through a crumbling building full of zombies.

WASD to move, Left Click to Shoot.

Charlie Chao : Networking Programmer. Project Manager, Designer 

Brian Huy Khuu: Designer, General Programming 

Jeremy Christopher Colfer: Art, General Programming, Designer 

Samantha Mary Terracciano: Designer, General & AI Programming 

Zhi Yu Han: Designer, General Programming

Sounds: Zapsplat.com, Freesound.org

Music: Bensound.com
